author: fgiust
msg: MRELEASE-77 Adding a test only mode, where nothing is checked in into SCM
Now you can run "mvn -Dtestmode=true release:prepare" and relax ;)

author: soc-rian
msg: - Don't allow a transaction without HELO/EHLO first.
- If we responded to a connection with a 554, then don't allow
another other commands, respond with a 503.

author: aheritier
msg: Remove usage of the deprecated dependency-handle tag.

msg: Add the default for project.start-uri to facilitate the speed trick faq.html#single-document
